flawed_nl_solution:
She previously had 2 cartons + 7 cartons = <<2+7=13>>13 cartons of berries.
Emilia needs to buy 42 cartons - 13 cartons = <<42-13=29>>29 cartons of berries.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
